bibl.author: Emil Arctander
bibl.title: Emil Arctander to Walt Whitman, 20 June 1872
bibl.idno: MSS18630, Box:4, Folder:"A" miscellany Oct. 1861-Jan. '89 & undated
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, DC.

body.p: In transmitting to you the last part of the translation, I beg once more leave to ask your forbearance. I know very well, that it is to say the least, a weak translation, but considering the original I was unable to do it better. I have marked some places with ? because the word used does not suit me, but neither in my head nor in my dictionary was I able to find any other.
Trusting however that this it must be of some use to you,
